description: This dataset looks at the projects and finance estimates for CDF Projects in the 290 Constituencies in Kenya. It additionally roughly categorises datasets into broad areas such as Education, Spending, Water and Sanitation Programs (WASH), Spending on Public Assets, Security, Bursary and Environmental spending.

name: Approved 2013 - 2014 Constituency Development Fund (CDF) Project Proposals
